content: description stay cozy with your into the woods cowl this winter the granny stripes give it a retro feel on a trendy accessory it s worked in one large piece for easy assembly customize your colors to fit your look this pattern is free on my linked blog this pattern is also available as a kit with lionbrand 1 it comes with all the yarn you need to make your own hooded cowl + the pdf digital pattern this pattern has a full video tutorial on my youtube channel 2 1 http //shrsl com/39f6b 2 https //youtu be/dck_v7ilt5m
